themes.name: Affordable Housing
themes.evolution_note: Began as a general need and evolved into detailed anti-displacement strategies with data citations.

themes.name: Parks/Open Space
themes.evolution_note: Consistently emphasized with increasing specificity in maintenance and staffing needs.

themes.name: Transportation & Mobility
themes.evolution_note: Expanded from traffic concerns to include specific programmatic asks like Vision Zero and transit improvements.

themes.name: Data Transparency
themes.evolution_note: Introduced as a new focus in FY2026 with structured recommendations for agency reporting and accountability.

themes.name: Affordable Housing
themes.evolution_note: Initially highlighted as a top citywide priority in FY2024, it is not explicitly repeated in later years, reflecting a shift to local engagement focus.

themes.name: Public Safety
themes.evolution_note: Public safety was a key citywide priority in FY2024 but was not explicitly emphasized in subsequent years, indicating a move towards procedural and local data focus.

themes.name: Public Engagement
themes.evolution_note: Grew from procedural mentions in FY2024 to a structured, institutionalized process with annual surveys and public meetings by FY2026.

themes.name: Agency Transparency
themes.evolution_note: Started with strong agency-response framing in FY2024, but shifted to a more neutral, administrative tone in FY2025 and FY2026.

themes.name: Local Economic Disparity
themes.evolution_note: Became more prominent with specific data examples in FY2025 and FY2026, highlighting local income contrasts and economic conditions.

themes.name: Affordable Housing
themes.evolution_note: Consistently emphasized as a top priority, with a shift from process transparency to addressing housing affordability and gentrification impacts.

themes.name: Public Safety
themes.evolution_note: Initially focused on crime and safety as priorities, later evolving to include broader violence reduction and conflict resolution services.

themes.name: Health Access
themes.evolution_note: Shifted from a basic mention to a strong focus on pandemic recovery and then to broader mental health and social service needs.

themes.name: Social Services
themes.evolution_note: Grew from minimal mention to detailed demands for mental health, domestic violence prevention, and elder/youth services.

themes.name: Demographic Changes
themes.evolution_note: Consistently highlighted through updated Census data to illustrate gentrification and population shifts.

themes.name: Affordable Housing
themes.evolution_note: Affordable housing remained a constant priority across all years, consistently highlighted as a pressing issue.

themes.name: Migrant Crisis
themes.evolution_note: The migrant crisis emerged as a significant concern in FY2025 and remained a priority in FY2026, impacting local services and quality of life.

themes.name: Climate/Flooding
themes.evolution_note: Climate-related flooding concerns appeared in FY2025 and continued into FY2026, highlighting environmental challenges.

themes.name: Agency Engagement
themes.evolution_note: Agency engagement started with a focus on transparency in FY2024, faced criticism in FY2025, and improved by FY2026.

themes.name: Process Transparency
themes.evolution_note: Initially a major focus in FY2024, process transparency became less emphasized in subsequent years as operational issues took precedence.

themes.name: Affordable Housing
themes.evolution_note: Evolved from citywide issue identification to detailed project-level implementation with specific developments named.

themes.name: Economic Development
themes.evolution_note: Shifted from general mentions of retail expansion to formalized industrial-business-zone strategies and workforce development.

themes.name: Agency Engagement
themes.evolution_note: Moved from a collaborative, transparent engagement with named agency voices to a more procedural and neutral tone.

themes.name: Community Partnerships
themes.evolution_note: Consistently highlighted, with a focus on local project accomplishments and stakeholder involvement.

themes.name: Capital Investments
themes.evolution_note: Progressed from general mentions to specific large-scale projects and infrastructure developments.
